title: 10 Ways to Style a Polo Shirt for a Sporty Chic Look This Spring
description: Discover the perfect combination of cool and casual.
excerpt: And it pairs well with everything.
text: The polo shirt is a classic symbol of American style. It’s versatile, comfortable, and the perfect middle ground between a casual tee and a dress shirt. The preppy staple’s popularity continues to surge this season, with our favorite brands offering both classic and modern styles from rugby polos to silk-blend tops and mesh laser-cut designs.This year, designers have experimented with various modern takes on the runway, hinting at the polo’s stylish renaissance. In Milan, MM6 Maison Margiela showcased unique shoulder-padded shirts for fall/winter 2025, and in New York, Eckhaus Latta presented a multi-layered knit version paired with opera gloves. While traditionally crafted from piqué cotton, they’re now available in various fabrics and levels of stretch–so you can find the perfect one for any occasion. An oversized rugby polo and a relaxed jean make the perfect casual outing ensemble, while a silk-cashmere blend is a more polished option that looks striking with a tailored dress pant and stilettos.We drew inspiration from our favorite looks seen at Paris Fashion Week and have rounded up a list of 10 editor-approved ways to wear this iconic tee. Read on to discover how to achieve a comfortable yet polished style with these effortless outfit ideas.A Knit Polo and Black BootsRaimonda Kulikauskiene/Getty ImagesFor spring and summer, open-knit polos are a great choice as they provide breathability in hot weather. Wear this with tall black boots and a flouncy white skirt to embrace the boho trend.Asta Resort Francie Knitted Polo in WhiteSimkhai Stella Pleated Midi SkirtLacoste Women's Lora Leather Shoulder BagAnine Bing Tall Tania BootsRay-Ban RB3025 Aviator SunglassesGorjana Taner Mini Huggies, Silver PlatedThe Polo TracksuitClaudio Lavenia/Getty ImagesFor ultimate comfort, look no further than this soft Merino wool set from Casablanca. This co-ord can be dressed down for lounging, or dressed up with a slingback heel.Casablanca Knit Tennis Polo ShirtCasablanca Logo Embroidered Wide-Leg Knit TrousersTony Bianco Anne Pump in WhiteBracha Rolly Bracelet in Metallic SilverLunya Washable Silk Classic Scrunchie in Deep BlueEssie Nail Polish in Rainwear Don't CareA Polished All-Pink LookRaimonda Kulikauskiene/Getty ImagesIf you’re looking for a sophisticated spring outfit, consider a pastel polo with monochromatic accessories. Add an edgy contrast with a black lace-up pump.Guest In Residence Long Sleeve Shrunken Cashmere PoloLevi's 501 Jeans in Scraped Pale MauveGanni Faux Leather Lace-Up Mules in BlackFurla Furla Sfera Medium Tote BagEttika Five Point Hoop Earrings in PinkEssie Special Effects Nail Polish in Gilded GalaxyA Navy Blue Co-Ord and Red BagClaudio Lavenia/Getty Images Don’t hesitate to pair a skirt with your polo! This combination of a midi style and cropped shirt offers an effortlessly cool twist on the trend.Khaite Morgane Short-Sleeve Crop Polo TopQuince Mongolian Cashmere Fitted Midi SkirtStella McCartney Ryder Shoulder Bag in Lipstick RedStella McCartney Spur Pump in WhiteKhaite Julius Loop Medium EarringsCompletedworks Freshwater Pearl CZ BraceletA Red Polo and Dark-Wash DenimLaunchmetrics / Szymon BrzóskaA rib-knit cherry red tee breaks up this dark-wash denim outfit. Perfect for a weekend lunch with friends, a patent heel and matching bag to finish this sleek look.Sandro Rib Knit Polo Shirt in CherryGood American Good Waist Palazzo JeansDalton Dalton Balloon JacketMarni Marni New Trunk Shoulder BagM.Gemi The Lisinda in Ruby Red PatentLe Specs Magnifique in BlackA Zip-Up Polo With A SkirtDarren Gerrish/Getty ImagesFor another choice that features a skirt, consider pairing this super soft zip-up shirt from the Gap with a contrasting midi and a low strappy heel. Keep the rest of the outfit simple with black shorts, cozy knee-high socks and leather boots. html:
The polo shirt is a classic symbol of American style. It’s versatile, comfortable, and the perfect middle ground between a casual tee and a dress shirt. The preppy staple’s popularity continues to surge this season, with our favorite brands offering both classic and modern styles from rugby polos to silk-blend tops and mesh laser-cut designs.

This year, designers have experimented with various modern takes on the runway, hinting at the polo’s stylish renaissance. In Milan, MM6 Maison Margiela showcased unique shoulder-padded shirts for fall/winter 2025, and in New York, Eckhaus Latta presented a multi-layered knit version paired with opera gloves.

While traditionally crafted from piqué cotton, they’re now available in various fabrics and levels of stretch–so you can find the perfect one for any occasion. An oversized rugby polo and a relaxed jean make the perfect casual outing ensemble, while a silk-cashmere blend is a more polished option that looks striking with a tailored dress pant and stilettos.

We drew inspiration from our favorite looks seen at Paris Fashion Week and have rounded up a list of 10 editor-approved ways to wear this iconic tee. Read on to discover how to achieve a comfortable yet polished style with these effortless outfit ideas.

A Knit Polo and Black Boots

For spring and summer, open-knit polos are a great choice as they provide breathability in hot weather. Wear this with tall black boots and a flouncy white skirt to embrace the boho trend.

Asta Resort Francie Knitted Polo in White

Simkhai Stella Pleated Midi Skirt

Lacoste Women's Lora Leather Shoulder Bag

Anine Bing Tall Tania Boots

Ray-Ban RB3025 Aviator Sunglasses

Gorjana Taner Mini Huggies, Silver Plated

The Polo Tracksuit

For ultimate comfort, look no further than this soft Merino wool set from Casablanca. This co-ord can be dressed down for lounging, or dressed up with a slingback heel.

Casablanca Knit Tennis Polo Shirt

Casablanca Logo Embroidered Wide-Leg Knit Trousers

Tony Bianco Anne Pump in White

Bracha Rolly Bracelet in Metallic Silver

Lunya Washable Silk Classic Scrunchie in Deep Blue

Essie Nail Polish in Rainwear Don't Care

A Polished All-Pink Look

If you’re looking for a sophisticated spring outfit, consider a pastel polo with monochromatic accessories. Add an edgy contrast with a black lace-up pump.

Guest In Residence Long Sleeve Shrunken Cashmere Polo

Levi's 501 Jeans in Scraped Pale Mauve

Ganni Faux Leather Lace-Up Mules in Black

Furla Furla Sfera Medium Tote Bag

Ettika Five Point Hoop Earrings in Pink

Essie Special Effects Nail Polish in Gilded Galaxy

A Navy Blue Co-Ord and Red Bag

Don’t hesitate to pair a skirt with your polo! This combination of a midi style and cropped shirt offers an effortlessly cool twist on the trend.

Khaite Morgane Short-Sleeve Crop Polo Top

Quince Mongolian Cashmere Fitted Midi Skirt

Stella McCartney Ryder Shoulder Bag in Lipstick Red

Stella McCartney Spur Pump in White

Khaite Julius Loop Medium Earrings

Completedworks Freshwater Pearl CZ Bracelet

A Red Polo and Dark-Wash Denim

A rib-knit cherry red tee breaks up this dark-wash denim outfit. Perfect for a weekend lunch with friends, a patent heel and matching bag to finish this sleek look.

Sandro Rib Knit Polo Shirt in Cherry

Good American Good Waist Palazzo Jeans

Dalton Dalton Balloon Jacket

Marni Marni New Trunk Shoulder Bag

M.Gemi The Lisinda in Ruby Red Patent

Le Specs Magnifique in Black

A Zip-Up Polo With A Skirt

For another choice that features a skirt, consider pairing this super soft zip-up shirt from the Gap with a contrasting midi and a low strappy heel.

Gap 100 Percent Cotton Quarter-Zip Polo Sweater

L'agence Fernanda Pleated Skirt in Black

Miu Miu Wander Matelassé Nappa Leather Hobo Mini-Bag

Tony Bianco Koko Slingback in Black

Ben-Amun Dot Earrings in Silver

Alexis Bittar Molten Bangle in Silver

A Rugby Polo and Leather Boots

For something with a looser fit, go for a rugby polo with bold colors. Keep the rest of the outfit simple with black shorts, cozy knee-high socks and leather boots.

Abercrombie Long-Sleeve Rugby Polo Top

Amanda Uprichard Kelso Shorts in Black

Lechery Woven Tab Knee-High Socks in Black

Frye Campus Knee High Boot in Saddle

LooptyHoops 14K White Gold Endless Hoop Earrings

Khaite Lina Crossbody Bag in Black

A Simple White Polo and Knit Shorts

Everyone needs a classic white option. This Veronica Beard top matches everything and has a flattering, fitted silhouette. A knit short turns this into a vacation-ready look.

Veronica Beard Kearney Button-Down Tee in White

SER.O.YA Kel Knit Hot Short in Black

Diff Eyewear Indy Sunglasses in Black

Comme Si The Yves Sock in White

Salomon XT-6 in Vanilla Ice and Almond Milk

The Sak Casual Classics Tote Bag in Silver

A Colorful Polo and Satin Skirt

If you haven’t yet added new spring colors to your wardrobe, start with this comfy knitted style from Aligne. Wear a butter yellow bag to further embrace the pastel trend.

Aligne Emmet Knitted Polo

Vince Satin Slip Midi Skirt in Black

Staud Ollie Bag in Buttercup

Sam Edelman Rosa Pump in Modern Ivory

Bony Levy Ofira 14K Gold Rectangular Chain Bracelet

France Luxe Mini Classic Rectangle Barrettes

An Oversized Polo and Tights

This playful look features an oversized polo dress and sheer tights. Pair this outfit with a stand-out silver bag, a headband, and an open-toe heel.

Stand Studio Kennedi Oversize Jersey Polo Dress

Wolford Cotton Rib Tights in White

Stuart Weitzman Nudistarc 75 Sandal in Blue

Mansur Gavriel Candy Mini Metallic Leather Top-Handle Bag

Breda Jane Bracelet Watch, 23mm

Hishexin Stretchy Headbands for Women, 8 Pack
